questions.question: What role are you willing to promote?
How would you categorize the context you're working on?
What is the extent of the problem you are trying to solve?
What quality are you trying to achieve with the pattern?
What is the nature of the solution you're looking for?
Which architectural style would you rather like to follow?
What kind of support to un-doing operations are you looking for?
What is the direction of the isolation intended?
In case of failures in processing, what is the strategy you'd prefer?
